attributes.action: Support President Sarkozy-Calls for an Educational "Renaissance"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
President Sarkozy has called on teachers in France to guide and protect the spirit and sensibilities that are not yet completely formed.
Also he stated "Religion should not be left at the School Door".
The president understands that children guided responsibly will be good citizens in later years, the conscience will be formed and they will be able to distinguish between Right and Wrong.
The violent and selfish society that has been formed in our present time, is proof that children must be guided by responsible teachers.
